title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Chances are you want to lose yourself someplace strange and exotic. Youre restless and tired of feeling hemmed in by routine today. Youre eager to dash off into more daring activities and escapades before anyone notices your absence. However, even if you cant jump on a plane and escape, you can still enjoy the experience of sinking into something wild and imaginative. Venture to a local museum or art gallery to stimulate your own musings. Or you could research a fascinating locale to visit sometime in the not-too-distant future. After all, adventure begins and ends in the mind. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
